We offer several ways to save! 💰

**Bundle discounts:**
• 2 coverage types = 10% off
• 3 types = 17% off
• 4 types = 25% off

**Volume discounts:**
• $100K+ coverage = custom pricing
• Enterprise contracts = up to 30% off

**Timing:**
• Buy when bridge health is high = lower multiplier
• Monitor `/bridges` for best rates

No promo codes (dynamic pricing is already optimized!). Want me to quote a bundle? 🤖
I got a quote but the price changed

Quotes are valid for **5 minutes** only! ⏱️

Why prices change:
• Bridge health scores update
• Vault utilization shifts
• Market volatility affects risk
• Other users buy/sell coverage

**Dynamic pricing = real-time rates!**

To lock in a price:
1. Get quote: `/quote 10000 30 bridge`
2. Review immediately
3. Use `/buy` within 5 minutes
4. Complete transaction

Quote expired? Just get a fresh one! Current rates might even be better! 🤖
What's the difference between you and Nexus Mutual?

Both provide DeFi risk protection, but different approaches! 🤔

**Tonsurance (parametric):**
✅ Automatic payouts (5-10 min)
✅ No claims process
✅ Oracle-verified triggers
✅ 100% on-chain
✅ TON blockchain

**Nexus Mutual (discretionary):**
• Claims require approval
• Members vote on validity
• Ethereum-based
• KYC required

We're fully **parametric** - if trigger hits, you get paid. No voting, no approval. That's the key difference! 💎
Can I be a liquidity provider?

Absolutely! Vault LPs earn yield from premiums! 💰

**How it works:**
1. Deposit USDT/USDC into risk vaults
2. Choose your tranche (Senior = safe, Junior = risky)
3. Earn APY from coverage premiums
4. Withdraw anytime (if no active claims)

**Six-tier system:**
• **Senior tranches:** 5-8% APY, lowest risk
• **Junior tranches:** 15-40% APY, higher risk

LPs absorb losses if payouts occur, but earn consistently when no events trigger!

*Note: LP features launching soon! Coverage is live now.* 🤖
How do I renew my coverage?

Coverage doesn't auto-renew - you control when to purchase! 🔄

**To renew:**
1. Check expiration: `/policies`
2. Get new quote: `/quote [amount] [days] [type]`
3. Purchase: `/buy`

**Pro tips:**
• Renew before expiration (no coverage gap!)
• Rates might be different (dynamic pricing)
• Consider longer duration if rates are good
• Bundle multiple risks for discounts

Set a reminder a few days before expiry! Want to renew now? 🤖
